CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper December 5, 1959, pg. A2, reads: "Present 'The Charm' - A one-act drama, 'The Charm,' by John Engle Jr., was presented by the Fifth Avenue High School Drama Club, recently, in the Fifth Avenue Auditorium. Above are the members of the cast during a routine rehearsal. Left to right: Patricia McCarth, Raymond Talley, Margaret Gaita, Richard Puleo, Henry Harper and Eleanor Heard. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Actors from Fifth Avenue High School Drama Club Patricia McCarth, Raymond Talley, Margaret Gaita, Richard Puleo, Henry Harper and Eleanor Heard performing one-act play "The Charm"
